name: Eldrin's Training
description: Eldrin the Guide is teaching you the ways of adventuring in this dangerous realm.

steps.title: Meet Your Mentor
steps.description: A kind veteran adventurer wants to speak with you.
steps.instruction: Speak with Eldrin the Guide in Town Square
steps.tip: Eldrin will teach you everything you need to survive.

steps.title: Understanding the Threat
steps.description: Learn about the dangers that lurk in Ashbee Realms.
steps.instruction: Learn about the monsters from Eldrin
steps.tip: Knowledge is your first weapon against danger.

steps.title: Know Your Strengths
steps.description: Understanding your abilities is crucial for survival.
steps.instruction: Open your Character Sheet as Eldrin instructed
steps.tip: Understanding your stats helps you choose the right battles.

steps.title: Arm Yourself
steps.description: A warrior without a weapon is just a target.
steps.instruction: Equip the weapon Eldrin gave you
steps.tip: A warrior is only as good as their equipment.

steps.title: Your First Hunt
steps.description: Eldrin has sent you on your first combat mission.
steps.instruction: Travel to Whispering Woods and find the Forest Slime
steps.tip: Eldrin is counting on you. Don't let him down!

steps.title: Battle the Slime
steps.description: Prove yourself in your first real battle.
steps.instruction: Defeat the Forest Slime in combat
steps.tip: Use Attack to deal damage. Watch your HP!

steps.title: Claim Your Spoils
steps.description: Return to Eldrin with news of your victory.
steps.instruction: Return to Eldrin with news of your victory
steps.tip: Every victory brings rewards. Treasure them!

steps.title: Growing Stronger
steps.description: Learn about character progression from your mentor.
steps.instruction: Speak with Eldrin about your growth
steps.tip: Each level makes you more formidable.

steps.title: The Path of Quests
steps.description: Eldrin teaches you about the quest system.
steps.tip: Quests give you purpose and great rewards.

steps.title: Trade and Prosper
steps.description: Learn the importance of merchants and trading.
steps.instruction: Find a merchant as Eldrin suggested
steps.tip: Not all power comes from combat alone.

steps.title: A Hero's Beginning
steps.instruction: Return to Eldrin for your final lesson
steps.tip: You're ready. The realm needs heroes like you.

completion_message: Eldrin smiles proudly. 'You've learned well. Now go forth and make your mark on this world!'
